articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Langer delivers shock resignation as Australia cricket coach
articles.description: Australian men's cricket coach Justin Langer announced his surprise resignation Saturday, just weeks after trouncing archrivals England in a lopsided Ashes series and months after winning the T20 World Cup.
articles.content: Australian men's cricket coach Justin Langer announced his surprise resignation Saturday, just weeks after trouncing archrivals England in a lopsided Ashes series and months after winning the T20 Wor… [+4081 chars]

articles.author: Dean Bilton
articles.title: Justin Langer was the perfect coach for the Australian cricket team, until the game left him behind
articles.description: Justin Langer helped lead Australian cricket out of crisis and into a new generation — one that must now go on without him, writes Dean Bilton.
articles.content:
What comes to mind when you think of Justin Langer?
There's the modern version  cap backwards and barefoot on the outfield grass, all mindfulness and elite honesty and an arm around every shoulder.… [+8884 chars]

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Langer resigns as Australia coach
articles.description: Justin Langer resigns as coach of the Australia men's cricket team, ending months of speculation as to whether he would continue in the role.
articles.content:
Justin Langer had been seeking a contract extension
Justin Langer has resigned as coach of the Australia men's cricket team.
The 51-year-old's contract was going to expire at the end of June and he… [+880 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
